alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 3:03PM EST until February 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 1 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Isolated power outages possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain is expected to transition to a wintry mix, and then become snow Thursday night into Friday. Snow or sleet may be heavy at times. The highest amounts are expected in the northern St. Lawrence Valley near Massena, where localized accumulations up to 12 inches are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
